pages.text: The $(major)Coal Generator/$ $(minor)burns furnace fuels to generate FE/$.$(br2)Furnace fuels that burn longer produce more FE.$(br2)The amount is configurable, but defaults to 6FE/t. With this, $(minor)1 Coal generates 9,600 FE/$.
If the Coal Generator fills up with fuel burning, it $(minor)pauses until it has room for more energy/$, preventing waste!
